content: This is perhaps the most brilliant analysis of a basic theme in Third Wave feminism that I have read. You looked into the convoluted structure of a complex behemoth and plucked out a cornerstone. The control of language has been a goal of the feminist movement since the 30 year lull between the First Wave and the Second. You just dissected a prime example in a cogent, understandable manner and exposed the deceptive underbelly for all to see.
